summary:
Shiva is a major god in Hinduism, especially in the Shaivism tradition. He is known as the Destroyer in the Hindu trio called Trimurti, which also includes Brahma and Vishnu. Shiva is considered the supreme creator and transformer of the universe. He is often shown as a yogi, living a simple life, or as a powerful warrior fighting demons. 

Shiva has many symbols, like a snake around his neck, a crescent moon, and the river Ganga in his hair. He is also known as Adiyogi, the patron of yoga and arts. Hindus worship him in many forms, including the lingam.
title: Shiva
